title: Assign Default Permission Set on User Creation
overview: Automatically assign the Data Sync Pro Starter permission set to newly created internal users, granting them baseline access to Data Sync Pro.
whenToUse:
1. Automated Permission Assignment – Use automation to grant appropriate permissions to the right users as soon as they are created, ensuring consistent access control.

2. Automatic Record Creation – Use automation to create an associated child record tied to a parent record based on conditions.
